text: "I've Got a Picture of Us on My Mind" is a 1979 song by country singer Loretta Lynn. It was released as a single via MCA Records and was later included on her studio album Loretta. It went to number 5 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles charts and number 2 on Canadian Country Songs charts. == Track listings == ;7" vinyl single * "I've Got a Picture of Us on My Mind" – 2:45 * "I Don't Feel Like a Movie Tonight" – 2:56 ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Country songs Category:Loretta Lynn songs
title: I've Got a Picture of Us on My Mind
